title: Teen shot in bedroom of East Knoxville home
content:
KNOXVILLE (WATE) – A teen is recovering at University of Tennessee Medical Center after he was shot in the upper leg.
Knoxville Police Department said the shooting happened at 12:48 a.m. Sunday morning at a home in the 400 block of South Hembree Street, nar Austin East Magnet High School. Officers said a 15-year-old boy was in his bedroom, with some friends, when he heard a loud bang and felt a sharp pain.
The teen’s injuries appear to be non-life threatening, according to police. During an investigation, officers could not find a weapon and could not determine whether the shooting was intentional.
